title: How to Invite Friends to WeChat

steps.title: Open WeChat.
steps.content: Open WeChat. It’s the green icon with two white speech bubbles. You’ll usually find it on your home screen (iPhone/iPad) or in the app drawer (Android).

steps.title: Tap +.
steps.content: Tap + . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Select an app.
steps.content: Select an app. Tapping an app’s name creates a new message or post with a link to the WeChat download page.

steps.title: Select a recipient.
steps.content: Select a recipient. If you selected your email or messaging app, tap the contact you want to invite. You can also customize the message to give it a personal touch.

steps.title: Send or post the invitation.
steps.content: Send or post the invitation. When someone follows the link in the message or post, they’ll be able to sign up for WeChat and add you as a friend.
